response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its immense worth of $1,200,000 to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special introductory price of $1,050,000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while securing this invaluable asset. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this opportunity.", "product_price": 1050000}
